name: Telegram Deals Bot
description: A Telegram bot that listens to deal channels and converts them to affiliate links

PHONE_NUMBER.description: Your phone number associated with the Telegram account

MAIN_CHAT_ID.description: The chat ID where the bot will send messages

LOG_GROUP_ID.description: The group ID where logs will be sent

CHANNELS.description: Comma-separated list of channel IDs to monitor for deals

FILTER_AMAZON_TAGS.description: Comma-separated list of Amazon tags to filter Amazon deals

YOUR_AMAZON_TAG.description: Your Amazon affiliate tag for generating affiliate links
